long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kolabrya AI summarizes large volumes of documents. User can upload multiple files of different formats and the tool will generate summaries, reports, and insights. Kolabrya AI significantly frees up user time by eliminating the need to manually draft notes and summaries. In summary, Kolabrya AI is a productivity and efficiency tool to assist with report generation and summarization of large volume documents.
